level.heading: Proceeds from disposal of surplus goods.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1039(b) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.
